properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 8:39PM CST until January 17 at 7:30PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...Tombigbee
River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River at Bigbee
* until Friday January 17.
* At 7 PM Monday the stage was 18.7 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 20.4 feet on Wednesday January 15.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Saturday January 11 and will
continue rising to near 20.4 feet by Wednesday January 15. The
river will fall below flood stage Friday January 17.
* At 20.0 feet...Residential areas on Hood Road near the river are
flooded. Extensive agricultural flooding is occurring.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
